charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_0100_:
If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
What a coincidence to see you here!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1101_0200_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] turned around and 
saw the sun hovering before [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1101_0300_:
...Or so [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] thought, but it was actually 
Alder’s Volcarona!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_0400_:
Hahaha! I see you’re struck by my Volcarona’s
beauty, eh?
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_0401_0600_: Yes! Volcarona looks happy to see you!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_0402_0800_:
Looks like he’s doing especially well today! He’s
really raising the temperature here!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_0900_: Actually, I found you at just the right time!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_1000_:
There’s something I’ve been wanting to teach you,
and now’s the perfect opportunity to do just that!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_1100_:
It’s been a long time since I set off on my journey
as a Pokémon Trainer.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_1200_:
And on that journey, I learned the importance of
being able to travel with my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_1300_:
I want to make sure our team and everyone here
on Pasio understands how important that is, too!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_0401_1500_:
Yes! I’m sure you’ll have no trouble understanding
what I have to say!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_0302_1600_: Why do you need to do that?
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_0402_1700_:
As a former Champion, I’m supposed to
foster healthy relationships between people
and Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_1800_:
Both of my Volcarona taught me that
important lesson.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_1900_: Haha, you look a little confused.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2000_:
I guess I should explain what happened before I
formed a sync pair with this guy.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2100_:
The first Pokémon that I truly bonded with when I
became a Trainer was also a Volcarona.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2200_:
But that Volcarona...has been laid to rest at the
Celestial Tower in Unova.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2300_:
We fought together, laughed together, shared our
joy together... I thought it would last forever.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2400_:
But all good things must come to an end...
Sometimes unexpectedly so.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2500_:
Thanks to my first partner Pokémon, I learned that
people and Pokémon can’t stick around forever.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2600_:
Because our time here is limited, we should
treasure the moments we have now.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2700_: My current partner here understands that, too.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2800_:
I learn so much from watching how hard
he works.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_2900_: That’s what I meant by “both of my Volcarona.”
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_3000_: I’ve already relinquished my title as Champion.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_3100_:
Nothing lasts forever—not our strength and not the
lives of our Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_3200_:
Even so, remembering the times you spent
together and the memories you shared will always
bring you joy.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_3300_:
You and your partner Pokémon have a special
bond that allows you to share important things
with each other!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_3400_:
The spark in your eyes as a sync pair is
a wonderful sight indeed!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_3500_: Be strong so they don’t lose that spark!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_0401_3700_:
Great answer! I hope you can find
happiness together!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_0402_3900_:
I’m glad to hear that! I see you understand
what I’m saying!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_4000_: Volcarona is known as the embodiment of the sun.
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_4100_:
Together with Volcarona, I’ll shine light on the
future, where people and Pokémon can live
together in harmony!
charaepi_ch0132_00_adeku/2301_1201_4200_: Whoa! Volcarona is burning with motivation!
